attributes.action: Halt MPs from interfering with the human right of expression and of speech,
attributes.additional_details: We must stand against all parliament members who would halt the right of freedom of speech and expression using whichever media we wish.
attributes.background:
British parliament is taking down websites and social media post,
That dare to stand against their ideals this is a direct attack on freedom of speech and expression,
An unlawful act by politicians Hiding their lies.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. In particular, we aren't sure what website you are referring to.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change you would like to see.
